 when did bw start
  KSLawDogg@... wrote: (Dewboy, you have got to be the dumbest person.  An insult to everything 
BW/BM stands for?  Laughable, for it's the other way around.  Transformer's 
came out as Roland, Code, or whatever new name has pointed out, 12 years 
before BW squirmed its way onto the scene.  Hell, BW was to cheap to get 
Frank Welker to do the original Megatron's voice for the thing on the golden 
disk.  It's only good points were Larry DiTillo and Bob Forward, both having 
worked on He-Man which was a kick ass cartoon (Secret of the Sword baby, 
yeah!).

Staying on subject, Transformers: The Movie was an awesome movie.  I won't 
say it was perfect, it was pretty cheesy how they slipped in the gay new 
Autobots.  But that's what happens when it's governed by toy sales.  Anyway, 
the tactic with the ship was smart and served its purpose.

They were trying to get the Dinobots in there because they wanted to get the 
hell out of there, something about a new, fully-powered fleet of Decepticon 
fighters jumping on their tired afts.  And the Dinobots are stupid, what do 
you expect?  Grimlock was a genius at one point in the third season, but 
that's another subject for another time.

Why were they celebrating at the end?  How many stupid questions do you have? 
They saved the planet from a giant MONSTER named Unicron that was going to 
obliterate the planet and everything else in the Universe.  That would be 
worth being happy about, though it was stupid to say it was the end of the 
Third Cybertronian War, I'll give ya that.  But they're Autobots, whaddaya 
expect?  And in G1 the Matrix wasn't a gay Heaven like in BM, it was just a 
device that held the essences of all the past Autobot leaders, although the 
Matrix of Leadership itself was stupid.  

Why would you want Spike?  That's almost as bad as wanting that fairy Daniel 
or the iinfamous Wheelie?   See people, Dewboy is a PRIME example of what 
happens when people polluted with Bob Skir's sheisse watch G1.  They 
amazingly forget that G1 came out about 20 years before BW and BM.  Idiocy.)

-L. Unitron
